CEEvent.Name: BC_event_oralsex_field_1
CEEvent.Description: {=BCCaptor_Text}You find {CAPTIVE_NAME} in a field of wildflowers, kneeling on the soft grass. The breeze blows through her hair as she looks up at you with submissive eyes. "My lord," she murmurs, "I've been dreaming of this moment all day."

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_oralsex_field_2
CEEvent.Description: {=BCCaptor_Text}She unbuttons your pants and pulls out your cock, stroking it gently. "You're so big," she sighs, "I can't wait to taste you." She takes the head into her mouth, suckling lightly before taking you deeper.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_oralsex_field_3
CEEvent.Description: {=BCCaptor_Text}Her mouth is hot and wet, her tongue swirling around your cock. She looks up at you with worshipful eyes. "Please, my lord," she begs, "I need to taste you."

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_oralsex_field_4
CEEvent.Description: {=BCCaptor_Text}You explode into her mouth, and she swallows greedily. She looks up at you with reverence as the breeze blows through the field. "Thank you for this gift, my lord," she whispers. "I'll never stop serving you."
